scripts.build: esbuild src/packages/sdk/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --external:log-update --external:chalk --external:boxen --external:node-fetch --external:node-ssh --external:yargs --outfile=build/sdk.js && terser build/sdk.js --compress --mangle --comments false --output --ecma 2021 build/sdk.js
scripts.build:cli: esbuild src/packages/cli/index.ts --bundle --platform=node --format=esm --external:log-update --external:chalk --external:boxen --external:node-fetch --external:node-ssh --external:yargs --outfile=build/cli.js && terser build/cli.js --compress --mangle --comments false --output --ecma 2021 build/cli.js
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build && npm run build:cli && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build && npm run build:cli && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run build && npm run build:cli && npm version major && npm publish
